reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Developing the Indonesian government bond primary dealer system and the domestic currency government bond market.

description.narrative: The project is designed to assist Indonesia's Ministry of Finance to develop a sound primary dealers system and recommend measures to promote the domestic repo markets. When implemented, the result is expected to be fairer, more transparent and robust Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) denominated government bond markets, which have improved liquidity and efficiency. This would result in lower systemic risk in the financial sector and accelerate the development of the Indonesian economy.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
